query.statement:
SELECT A.ARA, A.ARA_NM, A.BSU, A.BSU_NM, A.UPN, A.PJT, A.HNO, A.GNO, A.SPT, A.AMT, A.GBN, VALUE(B.BAMT,0) BAMT, ( SELECT AA.CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE AA, SAPHEE.ZCST111 BB WHERE AA.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND AA.LANG = #G_LANG# AND AA.CODE1 = 'CS123' AND AA.CODE2 = BB.BLD AND AA.MANDT = BB.MANDT AND BB.PJT = A.PJT AND BB.HNO = A.HNO ) BLD FROM ( SELECT A.CS126_ARA ARA, MAX(B.CTEXT2) ARA_NM, A.CS126_BSU BSU, MAX(C.ABR_NM) BSU_NM, D.CS121_UPN UPN, A.CS126_PJT PJT, A.CS126_HNO HNO, A.CS126_GNO GNO, MAX(D.CS121_SPT) SPT, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT, MAX(E.GBN) GBN, A.CS126_GKD GKD FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZLCODE B, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 C, SAPHEE.ZCST121 D, ( SELECT A.CS126_PJT PJT, A.CS126_HNO HNO, MIN(A.CS126_USD) USD, MIN(CASE WHEN A.CS126_GKD IN ('1','4','5') THEN '신규' ELSE '전환' END) GBN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B WHERE 1=1
AND A.CS126_ARA = #ARA#
AND A.CS126_BSU = #BSU#
AND A.CS126_BPM = #BPM#
AND B.VKGRP = #TEM#
AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_KND > '' AND A.CS126_USD BETWEEN #YYMM# || '01' AND #YYMM# || '31' AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') GROUP BY A.CS126_PJT, A.CS126_HNO ) E WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_KND > '' AND A.CS126_USD BETWEEN #YYMM# || '01' AND #YYMM# || '31' AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_ARA = B.CODE2 AND B.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND B.LANG = 'ko' AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = C.LGORT AND A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.CS126_UPN = D.CS121_UPN AND A.CS126_CST = D.CS121_CST AND A.CS126_PJT = E.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = E.HNO AND A.CS126_USD = E.USD GROUP BY A.CS126_ARA, A.CS126_BSU, D.CS121_UPN, A.CS126_PJT, A.CS126_HNO, A.CS126_GNO, A.CS126_GKD ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.PJT, A.HNO, A.KND, A.BAMT FROM ( SELECT CS126_PJT PJT, CS126_HNO HNO, CS126_KND KND, CS126_AMT BAMT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CS126_PJT, CS126_HNO ORDER BY CS126_USD DESC) AS ROWN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 F WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND SUBSTR(CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND CS126_USD < #YYMM# || '01' ) A WHERE A.ROWN = 1 ) B ON A.PJT = B.PJT AND A.HNO = B.HNO WHERE (A.GKD = '4' OR VALUE(B.KND,'') = '') WITH UR
